General.Name: Zhejiang Wandekai Fluid Equipment Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Zhejiang Wandekai Fluid Equipment Technology Co., Ltd. designs, develops, produces, and sells brass valves, fittings, and HVAC products in North America, Europe and internationally. It offers brass ball valves, casting valves, brass supply valves, HVAC system products, radiator control valves, and sliding sleeve fittings. The company was in based in 1993 and is based in Yuhuan, China.
